header.rec_loc: In the car with ANON, who is driving from Kenilworth to Leamington spa for work.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Driving, money, petrol, relationships, family, food, work, language use and slang, coursework, tidying, family, boxing, fighting, drugs, being tired, traffic warden, speeding, police, make up, speaking and pronunciation, traffic, Sunday market, sleeping, bus, overdraft, credit card, student loan, accommodation, shower gel, friends.
header.activity: Driving to work in the morning.

body.u: oh my god what are you doing?
does that DPD person actually know how to drive? or
what do you know? he's we'll meet him on the high street
I can give you my last five pounds if you need it
go and fill it now this morning
we'll be seeing him like erm then I'll have to go straight to work
I did think about that but I thought I'll probably see again tonight cos my sister's coming home and we're having a so
well have you got enough petrol for today?
got a couple of days sometimes just have to drive a bit more sensibly then
yeah well if you don't drive sensibly you're not gonna have a girlfriend
well no it's not it's hello I love you and I don't want you to die don't drive like a prick
I know but I'd rather you didn't get in any kind of accident you know? just you know being sensible kind of solves that problem
I guess you could go now
yeah but he hasn't has he?
no why has this thing not come on yet?
yeah it's still cold in here
I know I there you go
so tired hey and when people say I'm tie-tie it's like no you're not you're tired
I don't even remember it's just something people say and it really really drives me a bit crazy yeah
oh I'm so tie-tie today no you're not go away
no I don't think so funnily enough not it's the same there's two syllables to say tie-tie two syllables to say tired tired er it's got a er sound it it
it sounds like what you're trying to describe someone's who's like properly tie like they're tie
as apposed to you know slightly tired or you get a tie-tie instead of a bow tie
yeah erm at some point oh shit
I wanted my laptop I left it at yours again never mind guess I'll have it on my day off and then I'll do my coursework on my day off
well can you use your mum's and then
yeah I suppose if you send it to me I'll use my mum's
she it's on my Ipad isn't it?
yeah all my notes are at yours as well so just don't worry about it there's just no way I'm gonna
yeah is erm you know I had some pieces of paper? they're on your desk aren't they on your room thing?
and there's a little piece of paper in your side table
I remember you showing me a piece of paper
yeah just don't throw away even that half ripped one cos it just tells me how many words I need for each bit
yeah okay I'll try not to wreck my room tonight

literally since I've been home like I'll leave my leggings on the floor in my room just that nothing else and erm my mum will be straight in there and it's gone which it's washing I was like maybe I'll wait until I've got more than one thing to wash oh okay it's like calm down I know I'm at home but it's gonna be okay yeah the
yeah I'm winning we used to be so good at this game
you're not don't wanna speak to you
it was stupid why do I have to choose?
wait for when I get in
I'm gonna wait for when I get there
what time would he get in though like three?
must have been I think he's watching the UFC with
don't know who they are so I don't really care
they were the people fighting them
well I don't even know what UFC stands for
punching people in the head but
oh right okay see? that's that's
that's terminology I couldn't understand right there
what punching people in the head?
well I I dunno if I know what that means
I'm so tired why am I so tired? shit
oh no scare the crap out of me
that scared the life out of me cos if I got another three points I'd lose my licence
this is why your girlfriend tells you to drive sensibly especially this time of year they're all over the roads
I might I might start listening to my girlfriend
I think it would be a really good idea my makeup looks different today don't you think? what?
yeah kind of wish I spoke better now

like when I went to I spoke really nice like my phone voice and my working voice and but now I don't know being around people that speak differently everyone's really hey whatever yeah we'll just do this and that and like I don't feel like anything's pronounced properly
it's one thing if you're alright oh yes I shall do this for you monsieur you know?
well yeah that's there's a time and place for it but
oh I forgot about all the traffic cos the market's on but no one's gonna be at the market cos the train
oh brilliant oh yeah I'll just sit in here cos I've got a couple of minutes before I've gotta be early for work and you know I'd rather not make my day six and a half hours
er I swear I just fell asleep last night cos I was gonna but I didn't
yeah er I think you woke up just to tell me I was a dick
in the night your favourite game this time was like see how far we can like press up against the wall
I was trying to hug you and you
no you weren't you were facing the other way
and then you go I'm too hot I thought oh
no you were just sticking your arse into my side it was like you were properly bent in half that's how little bed I had like why?
it's alright that's why I kept just kind of shoving you and you woke up and were oh and I was like well move over and you were like oh
well Alana's not right today it's a bit
is it even? I don't like this song it annoys me who is this woman?
I don't know I'm still terrified about that traffic Womble oh my god
well you weren't speeding were you?
no I was doing twenty-eight it was a thirty but it still it's scared the shite out of me something I don't need for Christmas

mm well I'm not being funny though if you didn't have a car at the minute yeah I'd have to get buses for places and you'd have to get buses to see me and stuff but at the end of the day I'm gonna be at uni and you're gonna be
at uni so a bus pass would probably work out cheaper for you at the minute
the thing is I can get money in spits and spats I don't have three hundred quid to buy a bus pass
I know but you probably would in January
well I've got a thousand my loan to have to pay off and then five hundred pound on my credit card which keeps going up because I can't pay it off
I'm sorry I didn't get you in that situation so so I won't know how to get you out of it okay I know you spent a lot of money coming up to see me but like I paid for you like
yeah but you get a student loan I don't
oh you're so cute I'm not blaming I'm no not blaming you it's

I get a student loan but it it doesn't even cover my accommodation that's how little money I have so for me to be able to give you fifty pounds is my week food shopping and that means I can't do my washing or this or that when I'm at uni as much as I would love to pay for you to come up every single time

I wouldn't be able to live cos you know I know you're living at 's at the minute just for a bit but still you get your food you get your water you get your electricity you get your washing done that would cost you like seventy pounds per week just for you to live and that's without getting anywhere or
anything else that you might need like er shower gels and shampoo and things like that
yeah and we go through shower gel like no tomorrow cos
